example.name: Disillusioned with...
example.text: Several PPU members faced a ten-week trial for distributing leaflets telling soldiers-1 disillusioned *-1 with Northern Ireland duties how they might leave.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'disillusion' based on internet usage examples,membership in VN. VerbNet entry 31.1. Comparison with 'disenchant.'
